name: All I See
description:
Have you ever wanted to see a loved one again? Or perhaps go to a place you've never been before? With Project AIL by Sharper Industries, you can do just that!

Right now, we are looking for brave volunteers to test out this new software. Could you be one of them?

WARNING: Project AIL is still in testing. So only use the program once. If you enter the simulation again after one session, you may be exposed to severe brain damage.

CREDITS!

Game made by Nekosounds

Sprites made by Sumeragi Kohaku

Backgrounds by mugenjohncel

Music:

A Gift To Last

Alley Cat

Inspired by All I See by Nathan Sharp

Entry for the Brackeys 2022 Game Jam
